name: Finadict
techStack: Python, Streamlit, FB Prophet, Heroku, Git
descr: Basically, the project is a Webapp to predict the next day's stock / cryptocurrency / forex prices. It is created solely in Python, using Streamlit as a frontend library and FB Prophet to fit the Time-Series data and predict the next day prices. All the historical data is fetched using the yfinance API. I am adding this project on Synthax because I need help in modifying the app in both the Frontend and the ML aspect.

name: Weather-JS
descr: It's a web based weather app made using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript that sends HTTP request to Openweather.org API to get back the JSON response of the weather of the User-given city and is displayed properly using CSS.

name: PyScripts
descr: The project consists of several python scripts made to introduce beginners into the world of coding and Open Source contribution. I built this project during Synthax v1.0 in 2020 and I want this project to continue its legacy like last time.
